Key Match Events: Australia scored two goals to win 2-0 against India at the AFC Asian Cup 2024
Pre-Game Insights: Australia is a big favorite to win against India, with a score of 4-0 in their only previous meeting
India is looking to cause a surprise and get 3 points against Australia
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, with kick-off at 05:30
The match was televised on ESPN and streamed on the Star+ app
Others: Australia's Yoshimi Yamashita was the referee for the match
Neither team had any injured or suspended players
